entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of light snow near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of light snow early in the morning then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
